entry.title: Siddh Om Kavach
entry.summary:
Vendor: VAMA Mall
Type:
Price: 799.00

The Siddh Om Kavach is a divinely energized spiritual shield, carrying the sacred vibrations of the cosmic sound “ॐ”. What makes this kavach truly powerful is that it has been siddh in the ancient and mystical Juna Mahakal Temple, one of the oldest Shaivite shrines known for intense tantric and spiritual energy. The temple’s aura is believed to awaken dormant energies and protect devotees from unseen forces. When this Om Kavach is energized here, it becomes a potent symbol of protection, inner strength, and connection to Lord Mahakal himself. Ideal for those seeking divine grace, peace, and a safeguard against negativity, this kavach is not just a spiritual accessory, it’s a powerful conduit of higher consciousness.

Benefits

🔱 Divine Protection of Mahakal – Siddh at the powerful Juna Mahakal Temple, this Om acts as a sacred shield against negative energies, evil eye, and spiritual disturbances.

🧘♂️ Mental Peace & Emotional Balance – The Om symbol promotes calmness, reduces stress, and helps you stay centered in the midst of chaos.

🌟 Aura Cleansing & Positive Energy – It purifies your aura and attracts positivity, making your surroundings more peaceful and harmonious.

🙏 Spiritual Connection with Lord Shiva – Deepens your connection with Mahadev and aligns you with the universal vibrations of Om, enhancing your spiritual journey.

entry.title: (Launch Offer): Saat Mukhi Rudraksha – Energized at 7 Powerful Shiva Temples | 49x Energy | For Financial Stability & Growth
entry.summary:
Vendor: VAMA Mall
Type:
Price: 2100.00

Saat Mukhi Rudraksha – Certified and energized through rituals at 7 sacred Shiva temples. It helps in attracting wealth, bringing stability, and reducing the effects of Shani (Saturn). It helps to open all paths to financial growth.

Unlock Divine Power with Saat Mukhi Rudraksha - This rare 7 Mukhi Rudraksha is energized with powerful rituals and mantras at 7 sacred Jyotirlinga temples. Each temple adds its own spiritual energy—giving you 49x divine blessings in one sacred bead.

It’s a powerful tool for wealth, protection, and inner strength. It helps to seek spiritual growth and financial stability with Lord Shiva’s blessings.

Key Benefits of Wearing This Energized Rudraksha:

 • Attracts wealth and removes money blocks

 • Boosts inner strength and confidence

 • Brings success in job, business & personal life

 • Protects from negative energy & help in emotional and mental healing

How to Wear:

• You can wear this Rudraksha on any day of the week
• Cleanse with Ganga Jal or raw milk and chant “Om Hoom Namah” 108 times
• Wear on your neck or right wrist with full faith

Keep this divine weapon of Lord Hanuman in your vehicle, workplace, or personal space to invite his powerful blessings and unwavering protection!
